label: 斧役
本: The Lumber Industry in Early Modern Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 1995
説明文: Customary function of purveying wood held by the descendants of resident holders of woodland in Yamaguni imperial forest who traditionally had the legal function of purveying wood to the court and managed lumbering operations in the villages the comprised the Yamaguni area (pp 84-5).
